name: Phazer Punk
description:
A mini metroidvania. This is a strand game. Are you ready to go deeper and deeper... Phazer Punk?

Code & Sound: Neonalig

Graphics & Level Design: Studio Kraze

Prototype made during Ludum Dare 48


Controls: Supports Keyboard and Xbox Controller (controller may not work in menus)

Move: Arrow Keys/WASD | Left Analogue Stick

Jump: Space | A button

Action: F key | X button

Target Selection: Q or E key | Right Analogue Stick

Spaceship Menu: Enter | Y button
